title: Spicy BBQ Sauce
content:
We got this recipe from an old Martha Stewart episode. I thought it would be a neat occasional stunt to make our own BBQ sauce. Now this is a staple at our house.

Spicy BBQ Sauce

A smoky, spicy BBQ sauce we got from an old Martha Stewart episode

Dry Ingredients

  • 1/2 cup sugar
  • 1 tbsp celery seed
  • 1 tbps ground cumin
  • 1 tbsp ground red pepper
  • 1 tbsp garlic powder
  • 3/4 tsp chili powder

Wet Ingredients

  • 1 qt ketchup
  • 1 cup apple cider vinegar
  • 3/4 tsp liquid smoke
  • 1/2 tsp lemon juice

  1. Combine all dry ingredients in a small bowl with a fork or small whisk

  2. Combine all wet ingredients in a medium mixing bowl with a hand mixer or a whisk

  3. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the mixing bowl

  4. Mix until combined

  5. Refrigerate overnight for best flavor
